project_name: Is senescence a component of human PD and does experimental senescence lead to alterations in PD-related gene expression?
project_dataset: Human snRNA-seq PD Senesence Jose Bras Team Lee
project_description: Characterize the neuropathological progression of PD with single-cell resolution, and determine the levels of senescence, as captured by a transcriptome signature.
contributor_names: Lee, L, Marshall ; Kimberly, E, Paquette ; Kaitlyn, E, Westra ; Elisson, Lopes ; Andrew, D, Pyman
brain_regions: hippocampus; middle frontal gyrus; substantia nigra
types_of_samples: human PD and control postmortem brains
